commit.message:
c-decl.c (implicitly_declare): Call maybe_apply_renaming_pragma.

	* c-decl.c (implicitly_declare): Call maybe_apply_renaming_pragma.
	(finish_decl): Likewise.

From-SVN: r87840

+	(finish_decl): Likewise.
